kpi.name: M8013C10

kpi_info.title: EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Detach procedure by UE or MME
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated transitions to the ECM-IDLE state due to the Detach procedure by the UE or the MME . UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi.kpi_alias: EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Detach procedure by UE or MME
